page.title: 08Hill Farm Russian Colony
page.content: The Hill Farm Russian Colony There are some recorded papers saying that around the turn of the century some Russian Colonies were set up in Britain and they started off business in the Cock Clarks area. In Russia at the same time a business man asked the Russian Goverment if he could set up a printing press business.The Goverment said no so himself his family and close friends moved to Cock Clarks secretly. At Hill Farm they founded the printing press.The windows are big because the printing presses were displayed.
